description.description: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"A unique opportunity for you to spend time with our Superintendent, ask \nquestions, pray together, and be discipled and encouraged. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We, as Region 1, have the privilege of hosting our Network's Missions 
Van this September. It is a different way to learn more about missions: 
the missionaries we are investing in and the work that is happening 
around the world. It is a hands-on way to connect with what you are 
financially and prayerfully investing into. Call Region 1's office today
 to schedule a visit from the Missions Van to your church!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Region 1's Event-of-the-Year is not to be missed. It is an incredible 
time to come together as Region 1 for worship, fellowship, and 
transformation. We hope you and your leadership teams will join us this 
year!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"A time to come together as the entire Southern California Network; a \ntime of worship, teaching, encouragement, and vision-casting.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
